ad_text: Visionaire Windows Sponsored Visionaire Windows is a growing, family-owned and operated residential window and door replacement company. As the company continues to grow, we are looking for self-driven and hard-working team to be our installation crew for our iron doors. Responsibilities: -Prepare the job site for safe and clean installation (including unloading materials from truck upon arrival, carrying materials to appropriate locations, removing existing doors, making sure furniture in surrounding work areas are properly covered and cared for, etc.) -Interact with customers in a professional manner -Properly install doors using AAMA installation standards -Clean up job site when job is complete (including loading old materials on the truck, cleaning up any trash, wiping down glass, etc.) Requirements: -Willing to work a full-time schedule -Ability to regularly lift and carry 30+ pounds -Valid driver's license, clean driving record, and reliable transportation to and from our office -Excellent work ethic, customer service skills, and integrity are crucial -Detail-oriented -Works efficiently on a team and motivated self-starter to work independently Additional Skills: -Carpentry skills are a plus -Painting/Caulking skills are a plus Pay is highly competitive. Contact us for more details. FULL-TIME · KENNESAW, GEORGIA Iron Door Install Crew Apply now
